publications.name: Neuromorphic Optical Tracking and Imaging of Randomly Moving Targets through Strongly Scattering Media
publications.summary: Study on optical tracking and imaging through scattering media using neuromorphic methods.

publications.name: Imaging dynamic targets through scattering media with chip-scale ultra-high density diffuse optical tomography
publications.summary: Explores chip-scale ultra-high density diffuse optical tomography for imaging dynamic targets.

publications.name: End-to-End Neuromorphic Reconstruction of Moving Targets in Dense Scattering Media Using Event-Driven Sensing and Spiking Neural Networks
publications.summary: Presents an end-to-end approach using event-driven sensing and spiking neural networks for reconstruction in scattering media.

publications.name: Brain-Inspired Optical Imaging: A Neuromorphic Computing Approach for Image Reconstruction of Dynamic Targets Obscured by Dense Turbid Media
publications.summary: Describes a neuromorphic computing method for reconstructing images of dynamic targets in turbid media.

publications.name: Event-Driven Imaging in Turbid Media: A Confluence of Optoelectronics and Neuromorphic Computation
publications.summary: Investigates the integration of optoelectronics with neuromorphic computation for imaging in turbid media.

publications.name: Combining a Dynamic Vision Sensor with Neuromorphic Computing for Imaging in Turbid Media
publications.summary: Combines dynamic vision sensors with neuromorphic computing for enhanced imaging in turbid conditions.

publications.name: VCSEL Arrays as Chip Scale Sources for Ultra-High Density Diffuse Optical Tomography
publications.summary: Explores the use of VCSEL arrays as chip-scale light sources for diffuse optical tomography.

publications.name: Sub-mm Resolution Tomographic Imaging in Turbid Media by An Ultra-High Density Multichannel Approach
publications.summary: Demonstrates sub-millimeter resolution tomographic imaging using an ultra-high density multichannel approach.

publications.name: Ultra-High Density Diffuse Optical Tomography for Dynamical High-Resolution Imaging in Thick Turbid Media
publications.summary: Presents a method for high-resolution imaging in thick turbid media using diffuse optical tomography.

publications.name: Technology development for simultaneous wearable monitoring of cerebral hemodynamics and blood pressure
publications.publisher: IEEE Journal of Biomedical and Health Informatics
publications.summary: Focuses on the development of wearable technology for monitoring cerebral hemodynamics and blood pressure.
